faqItems.question: Is my private data used to train public models?
faqItems.answer: Absolutely not. Your context is isolated in your private tenant (Private Context). We use LLMs only for inference, never for shared training.

faqItems.question: What is the MCP Mesh?
faqItems.answer: It is our infrastructure layer (Model Context Protocol). It is the open standard we use to connect unstructured data to AI agents.

faqItems.question: Do I need an engineering team to start?
faqItems.answer: No. The "Communication OS" Apps work out-of-the-box on Day 0. Engineering is only needed if you want to expand with custom MCPs in the future.

faqItems.question: What is the Ideal Customer Profile (ICP)?
faqItems.answer: We focus on C-Levels of Scale-ups and Startups who already use modern stacks (Slack, Notion, Google) and suffer from information fragmentation.
